display_name: Filtered: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 2% desat
description: Non-Supine RDI at 2% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 2% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hrop2 +   hnrop2 + carop2 + canop2 + oarop2 + oanop2 + marop2 + manrop2)/(remepop+nremepop)
